title: Landslide warnings for 4 districts
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Landslide warnings have been issued for several areas in four districts due to heavy rains.
The National Building Research Institute (NBRI) said the warnings were issued for the Kalutara, Matara, Nuwara Eliya, and Ratnapura districts.
The agency urges people living in mountainous and hilly areas in the districts where the warnings have been issued to be vigilant due to heavy rains.
Indian HC denies reports of political persons fleeing to India
